text: Crime fiction is the genre of fiction that has to do with crimes, their solving, criminals, and their reasons for doing crime. Sometimes, crime fiction is also in the science fiction or historical fiction genres, but usually they are separate. It has several sub-genres, such as mystery fiction, legal thriller, (see John Grisham) and courtroom drama. ==Related pages== *Wilkie Collins *Charles Dickens *Dashiell Hammett *Raymond Chandler
title: Crime fiction
